Codecademy (http://codecademy.com) - New York, NY

Product Designer, Frontend Engineer, Backend Engineer, Recruiting Engineer

Codecademy is the easiest way to learn to code. Since August 2011, more than 1 million people have started learning the basics of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS with our interactive online tutorials. We're passionate about extending education opportunities to everyone across the world. We've partnered with The White House to teach kids to code and we're now building solutions for other programming languages and other learning methods. We're a small team but we're well funded (raised $2.5m from Y Combinator, Union Square Ventures, etc.) and have been covered extensively in the press (CNN, NYT, WSJ, etc.)

Come join us - codecademy.com/jobs or jobs (at) codecademy (dot) com.
